\subsection*{I Share with My Lover}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Incubus}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 &  repeated & oral & Yohimbe & ground / crushed\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 180.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
I have been using Yohimbe for years. I never ever take more than 3g at a time and usually more like 1g. I have experienced unpleasant effects on a 3g if the circumstances are not carefully controlled. On 1 to 1.5g almost never. I take 3g ONLY when I am able to be alone with my lover for 8 or more hours without interruptions, and I am very careful about what I eat before during and after. 



I frequently can stay hard for hours, have head banging orgasms, and often hold on to my hard and keep right on trucking after I cum. I have had up to 4 ejaculatory orgasms without loosing my hard. I sometimes have many dry orgasms. On the female side of things I can report my lover's nipples and clit experience tighter erections, and she is more prone to having vaginal orgasms including female ejaculation. Y is also a sleep killer.
